title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers. Same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, multi-model, file upload, RAG, admin panel).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI (TUI) for Ollama built with Go. Interactive model picker, chat history, syntax highlight.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Android-compatible, coroutines support, fluent DSL.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template: ingest PDFs/Markdown into Chroma via Ollama embeddings and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin: chat with Ollama inside a buffer, generate code, refactor, explain.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Lightweight shell library of curl snippets for every Ollama REST endpoint.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm, and Q&A using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client for Ollama with tokio, serde, and native TLS. Crates.io published.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app providing an Ollama chat widget with channels (WebSocket) and admin analytics.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component to embed an Ollama chat interface in any data app with two lines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot bringing local Ollama models to servers with slash commands.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 or GCP instances with Ollama pre-installed.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel-based chats.
